info.name: Cvent Exhibitors API
info.description: Retrieves a paginated list of exhibitors associated with a single event.

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/events/:id/exhibitors?limit=100&token=0e28af57-511f-47ab-ae46-46cd1ca51a1a&before=2017-01-02T02:00:00Z&after=2017-01-02T02:00:00Z&filter=id in ('{UUID}', '{UUID}') AND deleted eq 'true' AND hidden eq 'true'

query.description: The maximum number of records to return per page.

The continuation token returned from a previous class. This must be a valid UUID v4 if provided.
This will override any other pageable parameters provided.
Used to query records that have been added or updated before this time point.
Used to query records that have been added or updated after this time point. Default to the beginning of time of the data store.

query.value: id in ('{UUID}', '{UUID}') AND deleted eq 'true' AND hidden eq 'true'
query.description:
A filter query string narrows search results and supports the combination of logical and comparison operators.
The filter adheres to the pattern filter='field' comparisonType 'value'.

These are the comparison types that can be used in filter expressions:
* equal: eq
* includes value(s): in

The following fields are filterable:
* hidden (eq)
* deleted (eq)
* id (in)

request.description: Retrieves a paginated list of exhibitors associated with a single event.

response.name: success
